reviews.review_msg: While not the most organized professor, James is one of few teachers who can make a 4 hour lecture fly by. He does tangentalize, but with an eye to explaining the period to a class which frequently was unwilling to commit to the readings. He is very helpful, but expects students to write their own topics - required in every humanities class. Amazin
Pretty horrible -- very unclear, tedious, and an overemotional ticking time bomb. What a waste of $500.

Very frustrating instructor. Gives patronizing lectures about the importance of handing work in on time  but NEVER HANDS ANY WORK BACK! Has an obvious bias toward certain students. Expects every student to have a deep passion for the class content, gives zero direction for papers.Would never take a course with him again.
